mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_ID, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_PRICE, ROOM_DESC, ROOM_IMG_URL, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(REVIEW_SCORE)), 0) FROM REVIEW WHERE ROOM_ID = r.ROOM_ID) AS AVG_SCORE FROM room r ORDER BY ROOM_ID LIMIT 3
SELECT ROOM_ID, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_PRICE, ROOM_DESC, ROOM_IMG_URL FROM room r WHERE ROOM_ID != #{roomId} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1

SELECT re.RESERVATION_ID, re.ROOM_ID, re.USER_CODE, ro.ROOM_NAME, ro.ROOM_PRICE, ro.ROOM_DESC, ro.ROOM_IMG_URL, ro.NUM_PERSON FROM reservation re LEFT JOIN room ro ON re.ROOM_ID = ro.ROOM_ID WHERE re.USER_CODE = #{userCode}
SELECT REVIEW_ID, ROOM_ID, REVIEW_SCORE, REVIEW_CONTENT FROM review WHERE ROOM_ID = #{roomId} AND USER_CODE = #{userCode}
